text: Robert Gould Shaw (1837–1863) was a Union Army soldier in the American Civil War Robert Gould Shaw may also refer to: *Robert Gould Shaw Memorial, sculpture of the soldier *Robert Gould Shaw II (1872–1930), landowner and socialite, cousin of the soldier *Robert Gould Shaw III (1898–1970), socialite, son of the landowner
title: Robert Gould Shaw (disambiguation)
